name: Lunch Time!
description:
It's Lunch Time!

Place each character around the picnic blanket according to their favourite food or friend. Can you get the highest score?

If you like this game please feel free to leave a comment or share with a friend!

Controls:
Use your mouse to click and drag  any character to move them.
Hover your mouse over each character to see their likes and dislikes OR Simply click the check button to see everyone's likes and dislikes.
